title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Identity Fields
description: This event is in relation with journey and describe the profile Identifiers

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Identity Fields.
Profile ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Profile identifier identifies the profile sent/used in a journey.Present if the current step is running in the context of a unitary journey. E.g: foo@adobe.com.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Profile Namespace
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This field describes the Namespace referenced by the Profile used in the Journey. Present if the current step is running in the context of a unitary journey. E.g: Email, ECID
